properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Aa ii ii, haiya,
ciana citu riu nimwatwika,
muthuri na mutumia wake.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Rubaru niruonekire,
na rugekirwo handu haruo.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Na ningi ruohwo na mukwa,
na mukwa utakundurikaga.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Thengiu muno muno Ngai,
niundu wa kumanyitithania.
